target.code:
def calculate_tangent_arccos(tan_alpha, tan_beta):
    numerator = tan_alpha - tan_beta
    denominator = 1 + tan_alpha * tan_beta
    return numerator / denominator
target.description: Calculate the tangent of the difference of two angles using their tangent values.
target.name: calculate_tangent_arccos

target.code:
def tan_difference(tan_alpha, tan_beta):
    return (tan_alpha - tan_beta) / (1 + tan_alpha * tan_beta)
target.description: Calculate the tangent of the difference between two angles
target.name: tan_difference

target.code:
def evaluate_tangent_difference(tan_alpha, tan_beta):
    return (tan_alpha - tan_beta) / (1 + tan_alpha * tan_beta)
target.description: Calculate tan(α - β) given tan(α) and tan(β).
target.name: evaluate_tangent_difference
